data.title: Ohio Cities by Population (2024)
data.meta_description: Get a list of Ohio cities by population based on Census 2023 data.
data.text:
The most populated cities in Ohio are Columbus with 913,175, Cleveland at 362,656, Cincinnati with 311,097, Toledo at 265,304, and Akron with 188,701. You can get the most current Census population data for all 1,263 Ohio cities, sorted from the most populous cities in Ohio to the least, according to the 2023 Population Estimates Program and 2022 American Community Survey.

Sure, you can copy this list right into your favorite spreadsheet tool. Or save yourself formatting headaches and grab the latest Ohio cities population data as a ready-to-use Excelâ„¢ file below. It's time to stop searching and start digging into data!
